title: 10 massive red flags in developer job interviews
content:
This article was originally published on .cult by Mikaella C. .cult is a Berlin-based community platform for developers. We write about all things career-related, make original documentaries and share heaps of other untold developer stories from around the world. The job posting looked great. The company is interesting. The role offers you a challenge you’re excited to tackle. But when you get to the first interview, you have a strange feeling of unease… or worse, you think the interview is fine, miss all kinds of red flags and end up working somewhere truly miserable. Some interview red flags are applicable…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: If you're a developer searching for your next job, it can be hard to separate the real deal from the PR. Watch out for these warning signs.
